FuncDef: The display interface brief command displays brief information about all Ethernet interfaces on a device. The display interface brief command displays brief information about all Ethernet interfaces on a device.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays brief information about the specified main interface.
-

Displays brief information about the main interface.
If you do not specify main in the command, the command displays brief information about all Ethernet interfaces and sub-interfaces.
-

ExtraInfo: To monitor Ethernet interface status or locate an Ethernet interface fault, run the display interface brief command to view the status and statistics of all Ethernet interfaces.
